segments.text: Hello , Susan , it ’ s me , An .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am fine . I am going swimming this afternoon . Are you coming with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am afraid I can ’ t this afternoon . I take my daughter to her tennis class at the club on Wednesday afternoons .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe I can meet you at the club and we can play tennis together .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , I'll meet you at the club at two thirty .
segments.speaker: S2
